snippet: An investigator said that 10 people had been found trying to sell ticket vouchers — to be exchanged for tickets for this summer’s Olympics — at up to double their face value.
abstract: Rio de Janeiro authorities identify 10 people attempting to resell Olympic ticket vouchers at prices well above face value, which is illegal in Brazil.
lead_paragraph: An investigator said that 10 people had been found trying to sell ticket vouchers — to be exchanged for tickets for this summer’s Olympics — at up to double their face value.

headline.main: Rio Police Detect Olympic Ticket Scalping
